text:
A town panchayat councillor was killed in a road accident near Valliyoor on Thursday night.

Police said that Muthu (50), Nanguneri town panchayat councillor of ward 15, was going from Ervadi to Valliyoor on Thursday night with his friend Kamaraj of Perumpathu. When he was about to reach Valliyoor, a speeding car hit the motorcycle. Muthu was killed on the spot while Kamaraj was grievously injuried and admitted to hospital. Valliyoor police nabbed car driver Mahalingam of Maavadi.
title: Councillor killed
